Basic structure of pd Dataframe, like a dictionary with key:value, with a list as the value

-   the key = the column name

-   The values = the cells underneath

```{python}
import pandas as pd

mydataset = {
  'cars': ["BMW", "Volvo", "Ford"],
  'passings': [3, 7, 2]
}

myvar = pd.DataFrame(mydataset)
print(myvar)
```
